import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router' import {deleteById, upsert} from '../api/TaskService'; import ReactModal from 'react-modal'; const TaskList = ({tasks, setIsOpen, setTask}) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleEdit = (task) => { setIsOpen(true); setTask(task) } const handleDelete = (id) => { deleteById(id) .then(response => navigate("/")); } const taskFc = (task) =>
{task.name}
{task.description !== "" &&
{task.description}
}
return (
{ props.tasks.map(task => taskFc(task)) }
